text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text: Civil remedies under the Privacy Act

quote.#text: provable damages, including damages that are not pecuniary damages,
, but in no case shall a person entitled to recovery receive less than the sum of $1,000
or the sum of $1,000, whichever is greater
